tokenized_answer: The meeting took place close to the finalization of the model, so participants were focused on further experimentation they could conduct.

Finally, the team spent some time exploring normalization techniques and acoustic events, both of which could potentially improve model performance.

tokenized_answer: Grad A explained that he was trying to collect a set of acoustic events to help distinguish between various linguistic features.

Acoustic events were a feature of the acoustic signal that could be derived from the data.
